definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: A red carpet stretched across the cement floor, welcomingvisitors to a huge door that appeared to be forged of solid metal.
sentences.chinese: 水泥地上的红地毯一直延伸到一扇厚厚的金属大门前。

sentences.english: Carpet tool with aluminium head, 3 spray nozzles, tubes in stainless steel.
sentences.chinese: 铝制地毯手扒，3个喷嘴，不锈钢管身。

sentences.english: Sweeping the carbon under the carpet, as it were.
sentences.chinese: 通常的做法是扫走地毯上的碳，当它产生的时候。

sentences.english: This carpet is hand-made by traditional methods.
sentences.chinese: 这是传统工艺手工编织的地毯。

sentences.english: He points over to the guard room as a carpet installation truck pulls up.
sentences.chinese: 他指向警卫室，一辆地毯铺装公司的货车开到了。

sentences.english: They would have liked bare wooden floors throughout the house.
sentences.chinese: 他们本想在整个房间的木地板上都不铺地毯的。

sentences.english: The juice he spilled left an indelible mark on the carpet.
sentences.chinese: 他泼出来的果汁在地毯上留下了去不掉的痕迹。

sentences.english: I am looking for a 4 - by 6 -foot Oriental rug for my reception room.
sentences.chinese: 我在为我的接待室寻找一块四呎宽六呎长的东方地毯。

sentences.english: The wall-to-wall carpet hasn’t been updated in years.
sentences.chinese: 屋里的地毯已经有不少年岁了。

sentences.english: Raw Space Exhibitors have to carpet, design and construct their own floor space.
sentences.chinese: 展览光地参展商须自行设计及盖建展位，并铺上地毯。

sentences.english: Route carpeted floor in the right footwell.
sentences.chinese: 布置右边脚坑里的铺地毯地板。

sentences.english: Hoi Luen Environmental Services will employ the proper procedures and apply the correct chemicals to clean your type of carpeting.
sentences.chinese: 我们会用适当的程序和正确的化学品清洁你的地毯。

sentences.english: Seeing her on the red carpet was a sight I will not forget.
sentences.chinese: 看到她走红地毯的那一刻，我永远也不会忘记。

sentences.english: He recollected Cronshaw's whimsical metaphor of the Persian carpet.
sentences.chinese: 他回忆克朗肖经常谈起的那个波斯地毯的寓言。

sentences.english: He had removed his shoes and donned a pair of blue, faded carpet-slippers.
sentences.chinese: 没有穿鞋，脚上蹬着一双褪色的兰色地毯拖。

definition: sofa (loanword)/CL:條|条[tiao2],張|张[zhang1]/(Internet slang) the first reply or replier to a forum post
